thread.title: FTI Consulting Honored with 15 M&A Advisor Turnaround Awards

author: cnbc.com
title: FTI Consulting Honored with 15 M&A Advisor Turnaround Awards

organizations.name: chiyoda subsea limited group energy deal

text:
WASHINGTON, March 21, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- FTI Consulting, Inc. (NYSE:FCN) today announced that the firm has been recognized in 15 categories by the 12 th Annual M&A Advisor Turnaround Awards.
“We are honored that The M&A Advisor recognized our professionals’ outstanding work, which encompassed a wide range of service areas and engagements over the past year,” said Michael Eisenband , Global Co-Leader of the Corporate Finance & Restructuring segment at FTI Consulting. “These awards represent our dedication to our clients and our consistent delivery of best-in-class turnaround and restructuring services.”
FTI Consulting received awards in the following categories:
Consumer Discretionary Deal of the Year (Over $100MM)
Reorganization of Caesars Entertainment Operating Company, Inc., et. al. Energy Deal of the Year (Over $100MM to $500MM)
Chapter 11 Reorganization of EMAS CHIYODA Subsea Limited Group Energy Deal of the Year (Over $1B)
Recapitalization of Tervita Distressed M&A Deal of the Year (Over $50MM to $100MM)
Chapter 11 Sale of Katy Industries Distressed M&A Deal of the Year (Over $1B)
Restructuring of Lightstream Resources Ltd. Sec. 363 Sale of the Year (Over $1B)
Restructuring of Lightstream Resources Ltd. Chapter 11 Reorganization of the Year ($10MM to $25MM)
Chapter 11 Reorganization of Bachrach Chapter 11 Reorganization of the Year (Over $100MM to $250MM)
Chapter 11 Reorganization of EMAS CHIYODA Subsea Limited Group Chapter 11 Reorganization of the Year ($250MM to $500MM)
Restructuring of rue21, Inc. Chapter 11 Reorganization of the Year (Over $1B to $5B)
Restructuring of Samson Resources Chapter 11 Reorganization of the Year (Over $5B)
Reorganization of Caesars Entertainment Operating Company, Inc., et. al. Out-of-Court Restructuring of the Year (Over $1B)
Restructuring of Sequa Corporation Restructuring Deal of the Year (Over $1B to $5B)
Reorganization of CHC Group Limited Restructuring Deal of the Year (Over $10B)
Restructuring of Peabody Energy Corporation and its affiliates Cross-Border Restructuring Deal of the Year (Under $1B)
Restructuring of Ultrapetrol (Bahamas) Ltd.
The M&A Advisor Turnaround Awards program exclusively honors the leading distressed M&A transactions, restructuring, refinancing, products and services, firms and dealmakers in the United States and international markets. The nominations represented more than 250 participating companies and were judged by an independent selection of industry experts. The awards will be presented at a gala on March 21 at the Colony Hotel in Palm Beach, Fla.
About FTI Consulting
FTI Consulting, Inc. is a global business advisory firm dedicated to helping organizations manage change, mitigate risk and resolve disputes: financial, legal, operational, political & regulatory, reputational and transactional. With more than 4,600 employees located in 28 countries, FTI Consulting professionals work closely with clients to anticipate, illuminate and overcome complex business challenges and make the most of opportunities. The Company generated $1.81 billion in revenues during fiscal year 2017. For more information, visit www.fticonsulting.com and connect with us on Twitter (@FTIConsulting) , Facebook and LinkedIn .
